import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import CartWidget from "../cartwidget/CartWidget"; const NavBar = () => { const [categories, setCategories] = useState([]); const [cargando, setCargando] = useState(true); const [categorySelected, setCategorySelected] = useState(); const [productos, setProductos] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { if(categorySelected){ fetch(`https://fakestoreapi.com/products/category/${categorySelected}`) .then(res=>res.json()) .then(data => { console.log(data) setProductos(data) }) .catch(e => console.error(e)) .finally(() => setCargando(false)) } }, [categorySelected]) const getByCategory = (cat) => { setCategorySelected(cat); setCargando(true); }; return (
Tienda online
  • Home
  • Electronica
  • Joyas
  • Ropa de hombre
  • Ropa de Mujer
{categories?.map((cat) => )}
{}
); }; export default NavBar;
